section.p: The template records data collected for relevant parameters of tissue concentrations of anylytes.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:753)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:754)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:755)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the pharacokinetics parameter result. [SDTM: PPSEQ], [SEND: PPSEQ]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:756), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Pharmacokinetics Parameter Finding Set C85839 STATIC (CONF:757)
A coded value that identifies the pharmacokinetics parameter result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: PPTESTCD, PPTEST], [SEND: PPTESTCD, PPTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:758), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1545)
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: PPSTAT], [SEND: PPSTAT]

SHOULD contain [0..3] value (CONF:759)
The pharmacokinetics parameter result, as up to three observation values, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. [SDTM: PPORRES, PPORRESU, PPSTRESC, PPSTRESN, PPSTRESU], [SEND: PPORRES, PPORRESU, PPSTRESC, PPSTRESN, PPSTRESU]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:760)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:761)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:762)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:763)
Information on the specimen that was tested to derive the observation value. It may include information on the collection of the specimen as well as on the specimen itself.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.78)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:764)
Orients the performance of the test leading to the pharmacokinetic parameter with respect to a study defined timepoint.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.97)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:765)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:766)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:767)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:768)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:769)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:770)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:753)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:754)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:755)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the pharacokinetics parameter result. [SDTM: PPSEQ], [SEND: PPSEQ]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:756), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Pharmacokinetics Parameter Finding Set C85839 STATIC (CONF:757)
A coded value that identifies the pharmacokinetics parameter result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: PPTESTCD, PPTEST], [SEND: PPTESTCD, PPTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:758), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1545)
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: PPSTAT], [SEND: PPSTAT]

SHOULD contain [0..3] value (CONF:759)
The pharmacokinetics parameter result, as up to three observation values, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. The finding may be recorded as a coded value - if the result is character based - or as a physical quantity - if the result is numeric. [SDTM: PPORRES, PPORRESU, PPSTRESC, PPSTRESN, PPSTRESU], [SEND: PPORRES, PPORRESU, PPSTRESC, PPSTRESN, PPSTRESU]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:760)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:761)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:762)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:763)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.78)
Information on the specimen that was tested to derive the observation value. It may include information on the collection of the specimen as well as on the specimen itself.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:764)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.97)
Orients the performance of the test leading to the pharmacokinetic parameter with respect to a study defined timepoint.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:765)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:766)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:767)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:768)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:769)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:770)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the finding.
